const breakpoints = require('../../core/js/breakpoints');

if (!Element.prototype.matches) {
  Element.prototype.matches = Element.prototype.msMatchesSelector;
}
function preventMenuToggleLink(event){
  if(event.target.matches('[data-header-toggle-menu], [data-header-toggle-menu] *')) {
    event.preventDefault();
    // add a data-attribute to tell script-foot that it was clicked
    document.querySelector('[data-header-toggle-menu]').setAttribute('data-header-toggle-menu', 'clicked');
  }
}

window.preventMenuToggleLink = preventMenuToggleLink;

document.addEventListener("click", window.preventMenuToggleLink);

function activateHeaderNav() {
  if (!headerNavDomIsReady()) {
    setTimeout(activateHeaderNav, 250);
    return;
  }

  const targetL0Item = document.querySelector('[data-activate-onload]');

  if (breakpoints.isDesktop()) {
    const targetL1Item = document.querySelector('[data-activate-onload] .pageHeader__content-navigation-l1-item--active');

    if (targetL1Item) {
      targetL1Item.setAttribute('data-pageheader--item-active-onload', 'true');
    }

    if (targetL0Item) {
      targetL0Item.classList.add('pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item--open');
      targetL0Item.classList.add('pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item--active');
      document.querySelector('body').classList.add('pageHeader--active');
      if (document.querySelectorAll('.pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item--active [data-navigation-item-level="l1"]').length == 0) {        
        document.querySelector('body').classList.add('pageHeader--noL1');
      }
      if(document.body.classList.contains('hasAsm')){
        document.body.style.paddingTop = (parseInt(document.body.style.paddingTop) + document.querySelector('.pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item--open .pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item-content').offsetHeight) + 'px';
      }
    }
  } else {
    if (targetL0Item) {
      targetL0Item.classList.add('pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item--active');
    }
  }
}

function headerNavDomIsReady() {
  if (!!document.querySelector('body.styleguide')) {
    return true;
  }

  return !!document.querySelector('.pageHeader__content-navigation-l0-item');
}

activateHeaderNav();

function isIE() {
    var ua = window.navigator.userAgent; //Check the userAgent property of the window.navigator object
    var msie = ua.indexOf('MSIE '); // IE 10 or older
    var trident = ua.indexOf('Trident/'); //IE 11

    return (msie > 0 || trident > 0);
}

if(isIE()){
    var cssVars = require('./css-vars-ponyfill.js');
    // Default values
    cssVars({
        // Targets
        rootElement   : document,
        shadowDOM     : false,
    
        // Sources
        include       : 'link[rel=stylesheet],style',
        exclude       : '',
        variables     : {},
    
        // Options
        onlyLegacy    : true,
        preserveStatic: true,
        preserveVars  : false,
        silent        : false,
        updateDOM     : true,
        updateURLs    : true,
        watch         : false,

        onBeforeSend: function(xhr, elm, url) {
        // ...

        // ...
        }
    });
}
},{"./css-vars-ponyfill.js":15}],17:[function(require,module,exports){
arguments[4][2][0].apply(exports,arguments)
},{"dup":2}],18:[function(require,module,exports){
/**
 * @fileOverview  Breakpoint configuration
 * Must always match what is stored in /src/core/settings.less
 */

var emPixels = 16;

// The size of 1 pixel in ems
var px = 0.0625 - (0.0625 / 2);
// Remove half a pixel due to an rounding issue in IE

var breakpoints = {
    min: {
        sm: '35.5em',
        md: '48em',
        lg: '64.0625em',
        xl: '90em',
    },
    max: {
        xs: (35.5 - px) + 'em',
        sm: (48 - px) + 'em',
        md: (64.0625 - px) + 'em',
        lg: (90 - px) + 'em',
        maxWidth: '73.125em'
    },
    viewports: [
      'xs',
      'sm',
      'md',
      'lg',
      'xl',
    ],
    px: {
      max: {
        lg: 1439.5,
        maxWidth: 1170,
        md: 1024.5,
        sm: 767.5,
        xs: 567.5
      },
      min: {
        lg: 1025,
        md: 768,
        sm: 568,
        xl: 1440
      }
    }
};

breakpoints.currentViewport = function (options) {
  var viewport;
  var isViewport;

  for(var i = 0; i < breakpoints.viewports.length; i++){
    isViewport = true;
    var currWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;

    var min = breakpoints.px.min[breakpoints.viewports[i]] || null;
    var max = breakpoints.px.max[breakpoints.viewports[i]];

    if (min !== null && currWidth < min) {
      isViewport = false;
    }

    // noinspection RedundantIfStatementJS
    if (currWidth > max) {
      isViewport = false;
    }

    if(isViewport){
      viewport = breakpoints.viewports[i];
      break;
    }
  }

  if (options.threeViewportsOnly) {
    if (viewport === 'xs') {
      viewport = 'sm';
    } else if (viewport === 'xl') {
      viewport = 'lg';
    }
  }

  return viewport;
};

breakpoints.isMobile = function () {
  return breakpoints.currentViewport({
    threeViewportsOnly: true,
  }) === 'sm';
};

breakpoints.isSmall = function () {
  const viewport = breakpoints.currentViewport({
    threeViewportsOnly: true,
  });

  return viewport === 'sm' || viewport === 'md';
};

breakpoints.isDesktop = function () {
  const viewport = breakpoints.currentViewport({
    threeViewportsOnly: true,
  });

  return viewport === 'lg';
};

module.exports = breakpoints;

},{}],19:[function(require,module,exports){
const breakpoints = require('./breakpoints');

if (Modernizr.touchevents && breakpoints.isSmall()) {
    document.documentElement.classList.add('mobile');
    var meta = document.createElement('meta');
    meta.name = "utag-device";
    meta.content = "mobile=true";
    document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(meta);
}else {
    var meta = document.createElement('meta');
    meta.name = "utag-device";
    meta.content = "mobile=false";
    document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(meta);
}
},{"./breakpoints":18}],20:[function(require,module,exports){
/**
 * Add modernizr.  This will be available in the global scope in var `Modernizr`
 *
 * @see https://github.com/thlorenz/browserify-shim
 * @see ./shim.js
 */

var root = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
if(root.className.indexOf(' js') == -1){
    root.className += ' js';
}

// preventing browser autofill for autocomplete formfields
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function(event){
    if(document.querySelectorAll('[data-autocomplete]').length > 0){
        var autocompleteList = document.querySelectorAll('[data-autocomplete]');
        autocompleteList.forEach(function(item){
            if(item.value == ''){
                var date = new Date();
                var timestamp = date.getTime();
                var name = item.getAttribute('name');
                var id = item.getAttribute('id');
                item.setAttribute('data-temp-name', name);
                item.setAttribute('name', 'tempName' + timestamp);
                item.setAttribute('data-temp-id', id);
                item.setAttribute('id', 'tempId' + timestamp);
                item.setAttribute('data-temp-attrs-set', true);
            }
        });
    }
});
